pr_title: ISPN-12325 Hot Rod server instances in tests use too much memory

timeline.bodyText: Did you mean to include these changes in this PR?
timeline.author: wburns
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -87,30 +87,9 @@
         </sequential>
     </macrodef>
     <target name="-do.kinit" depends="-check.skipped" unless="tests.skipped">
-        <exec executable="bash" outputproperty="ps.pid" resultproperty="ps.result" failifexecutionfails="false"

replies.bodyText: No, but the PR with those changes  (#8679) got integrated sometime ago, so I'm not sure why GitHub was still showing them. I pushed again and they disappeared from the diff view.
replies.author: danberindei

timeline.message: ISPN-12325 Hot Rod server instances in tests use too much memory
